Uses of ECJEvolvableAgent in abce.agency.firm
 

Classes in abce.agency.firm that implement ECJEvolvableAgent
 class ECJProdPriceFirm
          ECJFirm implements the interface ECJEvolvableAgents on an ECFirm, providing the ability of StimulusResponse objects to inform AgencyGPIndividuals and alter the behavior of this ECJFirm from within ECJ.
